parameters.name: Is2Sided
parameters.description: True if the rib is double-sided, false if the rib is single sided; a double-sided rib thickens on both sides of the sketch

parameters.name: ReverseThicknessDir
parameters.description: True to thicken the opposite side of the sketch normal, false to not; only valid for single-sided ribs

parameters.name: Thickness
parameters.description: Rib thickness

parameters.name: ReferenceEdgeIndex
parameters.description: Edge in the sketch to use to determine the material direction and for draft reference; when the rib is drafted, the mid point of this edge maintains the thickness value; other points on the rib may have a different thicknesses due to the draft

parameters.name: ReverseMaterialDir
parameters.description: True to flip the direction of the extrusion, false to not

parameters.name: IsDrafted
parameters.description: True to draft the rib, false to not

parameters.name: DraftOutward
parameters.description: True to draft the rib outward, false to not; only valid if IsDrafted is true

parameters.name: DraftAngle
parameters.description: Draft angle of the rib; only valid if IsDrafted is true

parameters.name: IsNormToSketch
parameters.description: True if extrusion direction is normal to sketch, false if parallel to sketch

parameters.name: IsDraftedFromWall
parameters.description: True if draft is from wall, false if not; only valid if IsDrafted is true

ReverseMaterialDir
,
   System.Boolean
IsDrafted
,
   System.Boolean
DraftOutward
,
   System.Double
DraftAngle
,
   System.Boolean
IsNormToSketch
,
   System.Boolean
IsDraftedFromWall
)

parameters.name: Thickness

parameters.name: ReferenceEdgeIndex
parameters.description: Edge in the sketch to use to determine the material direction and for draft reference; when the rib is drafted, the mid point of this edge maintains the thickness value; other points on the rib may have a different thicknesses due to the draft

parameters.name: ReverseMaterialDir
parameters.description: True to flip the direction of the extrusion, false to not

parameters.name: IsDrafted
parameters.description: True to draft the rib, false to not

parameters.name: DraftOutward
parameters.description: True to draft the rib outward, false to not; only valid if IsDrafted is true

parameters.name: DraftAngle
parameters.description: Draft angle of the rib; only valid if IsDrafted is true

parameters.name: IsNormToSketch
parameters.description: True if extrusion direction is normal to sketch, false if parallel to sketch

parameters.name: IsDraftedFromWall
parameters.description: True if draft is from wall, false if not; only valid if IsDrafted is true
